title: Cloud Natural Language - Method: documents.classifyText
abstract:
# Cloud Natural Language - Method: documents.classifyText
- [HTTP request](#body.HTTP_TEMPLATE) 
- [Request body](#body.request_body) - [JSON representation](#body.request_body.SCHEMA_REPRESENTATION) 
- [Response body](#body.response_body) - [JSON representation](#body.ClassifyTextResponse.SCHEMA_REPRESENTATION) 
- [Authorization scopes](#body.aspect) 
- [Try it!](#try-it) 
Classifies a document into categories.
#
content:
## HTTP request`POST https://language.googleapis.com/v1beta2/documents:classifyText`
The URL uses [gRPC Transcoding](https://google.aip.dev/127) syntax.
### Request bodyThe request body contains data with the following structure:
| JSON representation                        |
|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| { "document": { object (Document) }, "classificationModelOptions": { object (ClassificationModelOptions) } } || Fields      | Fields.1                            |
|:---------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| document     | object (Document) Required. Input document.                   |
| classificationModelOptions | object (ClassificationModelOptions) Model options to use for classification. Defaults to v1 options if not specified. |
### Response bodyThe document classification response message.
If successful, the response body contains data with the following structure:| JSON representation           |
|:---------------------------------------------------------------|
| { "categories": [ { object (ClassificationCategory) } ] } || Fields  | Fields.1                 |
|:-------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| categories[] | object (ClassificationCategory) Categories representing the input document. |
### Authorization scopesRequires one of the following OAuth scopes:- `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-language`
- `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform`For more information, see the [Authentication Overview](https://cloud.google.com/docs/authentication/) .
